chart_description: The Apps Processes chart provides a stacked view of the number of processes running on your system by container, plugin, Kubernetes processes (kube-proxy and kubelet), other processes, SQL processes, Netdata processes, system processes, and tc-qos-helper processes.

dimension_descriptions.containers: Number of processes running inside Docker containers
dimension_descriptions.kubelet: Number of Kubernetes node agent processes
dimension_descriptions.netdata: Number of Netdata internal processes required for core functionality
dimension_descriptions.other: Number of other processes running on the system
dimension_descriptions.sql: Number of processes running SQL databases
